T17bsa007_u:518: tadyathā - savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhamiti prathamadhyānam /
T17bsa007_u:834: abhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pluto 'rddhaplutaḥ sarvāstānapluto dṛṣṭadharmasamaḥ kāyasākṣī khaṅgaśceti //
T17bsa007_u:836: katamat? tadyathā - idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamanuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasiṃgavataḥ(?)
T17bsa007_u:840: ityekaparicatakaḥ 1 idaṃ duḥkhamārya sa tatra khalvabhijñātaṃ iti bhikṣavaḥ /
T17bsa007_u:842: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatvaṃ tava khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
T17bsa007_u:844: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhaāryyasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya śākṣāt kartavyamiti hitya dvitīyaḥ /
T17bsa007_u:845: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhaāryasatya tatra khalu bhijñāya śākṣāt dvitīya /
T17bsa007_u:847: idaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāmini pratipa ityāryyasatyaṃ tatra khalu bhijñāya bhāvayitavyamiti hi bhikṣava ityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
T17bsa007_u:854: pūrvamanuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasigavataḥ cakṣurudapādi /
T17bsa007_u:857: ityekaparivartaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti hi bhikṣavaḥ /
T17bsa007_u:862: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tava khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hītyādi tṛtīyam //
T17bsa007_u:863: tathā idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyamiti hi pratyekaḥ //
T17bsa007_u:864: idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣāt kartavyamiti hityādi /
T17bsa007_u:866: idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣāt kṛtamiti dvitīyaḥ /
T17bsa007_u:869: ityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya bhātavyamiti hi bhikṣavaḥ ityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
T17bsa007_u:874: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasikurvataḥ cakṣurudapādi jñānamudapādi vidyodapādi bhūrirudapādītyekaṃ parivartakam /
T17bsa007_u:875: idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti hi (me)
T17bsa007_u:876: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasikurvata iti dvitīyam /
T17bsa007_u:877: idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti bhikṣavaḥ ityādi pūrvavaditi tṛtīyam //
T17bsa007_u:879: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya prahātavyamiti dvitīyam /
T17bsa007_u:880: ] idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hītyādi tṛtīyam /
T17bsa007_u:882: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣātkartavyamiti hītyādi dvitīyam /
T17bsa007_u:883: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtamiti tṛtīyam //
T17bsa007_u:885: iyaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāminī pratipadityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhivijñāya bhāvayitavyamiti hi bhikṣava ityādi dvitīyam /
T17bsa007_u:886: [idaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāminī pratipadityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya bhāvitamiti tṛtīyam // ]
T17bsa007_u:1077: bhavati na ca bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
T17bsa007_u:1078: naiva bhavati na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt /
